name: Codo Bubble Pop
description:
Codo Bubble Pop - Fun and addictive bubble shoot game!
This is the most classic and amazing shooting bubble buster game, make combinations of 3 or more bubbles to make them burst, collect all the candy to level up.
How to play:
1.Tap where you want the bubble.
2.To group 3 or more bubbles to make them burst.
3.Use the limited bubbles and collect all the candy to level up.
